name: Stellar Predator
description: When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an Oz, and after Fischl uses a Normal Attack: Deal 2 Electro DMG. (Consumes Usage(s))
descriptionraw: When your $[A1401], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114011]</color>, and after $[A1401] uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: Deal 2 $[K104]. (Consumes $[K3])
